about.title: Best Book Shop In Your Home Town

hero.h1: What Book Are You Looking For?
hero.p: Not Sure What To Read Next? Explore Our Catalog

desc.h1: I'd rather read some schedule or catalog than not read anything at all

bookstores.p: Click to view on the map

delivery.p: The processing and execution time of the order is one day. After confirming the readiness of your order, you can pick it up from 10:00 to 22:00. The shelf life of the order is 7 days.
delivery.p-2: Delivery is carried out every day from 10:00 to 21:00. The delivery time is determined automatically when choosing a carrier company. • The cost of delivery in Bishkek is 200 soms. • When ordering from 3000 soms — for free.
delivery.p-3: Delivery to one of the points of delivery of orders of the companies Beber logistics, Pyaterochka stores and others. The terms and cost of delivery are determined depending on the location of the pick-up point. Delivery time from 2 working days.
delivery.h2-4: Delivery in the Kyrgyzstan and the CIS
delivery.p-4: Convenient delivery to all cities of Kyrgyzstan. When placing an order, specify your locality, and we will offer all available delivery options, indicating the terms and cost.

payments.h2: Payment methods for orders in the online store MIDNIGHTS
payments.p1: Choose a convenient way to pay for orders in book24.ru - the official online store of the publishing group EKSMO-AST
payments.p5: We accept all types of payment
payments.h4: You can pay for the order on the website with MIR, Visa, MasterCard bank cards, as well as via Yandex Pay.
payments.p6: Pay for orders on book24.ru using bank cards is safe. We do not receive your payment card data, you directly transfer them to the payment system via a secure data transfer protocol. When paying with bank cards, additional one-time SMS codes sent to your mobile phone are also used
payments.p7: After payment of the order, an electronic receipt will be sent to the email address that you specified during the payment
payments.p8: Please note, when choosing this type of payment, the product is booked for you for 7 days, during this time it is possible to make a payment. If the order is not paid within the specified period, the reservation is withdrawn and the order is automatically canceled.

footer.pp: The managing director & cluster head in Kyrgyz Republic at Bishkek City.
footer.p: Find your nearest Midnights! store with opening hours, location and contact detail
